name: Car Mechanic!
description:
Enter the garage and use your skills to make used cars look brand-new! Repair them, repaint them and put new life into them!

Are you ready to:
- Clean and polish cars to perfection
- Paint them to look completely fresh
- Replace their parts to make them run like new
- Check out their performance

With a lot of great cars to unlock and work with during the game you will not run out of surprises quickly. You will also discover new tools and possibilities as you play!

The game features:
- 30 detailed cars
- 2 garages
- Various tools to use
- Multiple upgrades to unlock

Try it out! Become a car mechanic. You’ll be surprised by the difference you can make to those vehicles!
